turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like you to order a Latte from Starbucks fo me.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What is your location?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I am in South Lake Tahoe California.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: There is four locations of Starbucks in South Lake California. Would you like a list of locations.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, I would like you to order from the Starbucks at South Y Center.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like to order Starbucks on Emerald Bay Rd.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: How many Latte do you need?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: One.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Large.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What kind of Milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Whole Milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: When would you like to pick up your Latte?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: In twenty minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You would like to pick up your latte at 3:45 ?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: One Large Latte with whole milk will be ready for you in 15 minutes at Emerald Bay RD. Your receipt will be mailed to you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your recipt will be texted to your mobile phone.
